headline: Show HN: Awesome-Cosmopolitan
description:
I've been curating, with help from the redbean Discord community, a list of cosmo related things.

Projects, ports, docs, blog posts, really whatever we think would be cool to centralize.

You might not realize how many things have been ported, so I wanted to share:

- https://github.com/shmup/awesome-cosmopolitan#ports

If you don't know about Cosmopolitan Libc in general, start here:

- https://github.com/shmup/awesome-cosmopolitan#cosmopolitan
